summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of September 2015. It includes information on deposits, checks paid, and the ending balance for the account, highlighting significant transactions during that period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial statement from Deutsche Bank, detailing his account activity.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for September 2015
events.description: The document summarizes the account balance and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of September 2015.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account balance as of September 1, 2015, was $122,989.71.
A significant deposit of $550,000.00 was made on September 11, 2015.
The ending balance as of September 30, 2015, was $164,789.71.
A check for $8,200.00 was paid on September 10, 2015.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
